review: love this game

i tried to give this a fair shot there are still bugs present that never got fixed the camera is still not great and your mileage may vary if mods will work the graphical enhancements are very minor  id rather just go play the og version on gog or if you have platinum on steam

this version of neverwinter nights 2 is not worth buying there are barely any improvements the game still suffers from the same bugs as the original release and there are no plans to patch or fix them

im new to neverwinter but i absolutely love the mechanics and character building from my understanding it looks like there hasnt been much changed from the gog version but i totally enjoy this title i hope by purchasing i at least encourage the team to develop something a little more modern but with like mechanics highly recommend if you enjoy titles like baldurs gate 3 or pillars of eternity
currently not worth your time or your money ill update my review if they update the game

they didnt modernize anything in this title and its in dire need to qol updates and changes  its barely playable in its current state you cant remap camera controls there is some kind of movement stuttering on high end systems  feels worse to play than nwn1 and bg12 imo  they could have easily updated the controls and interface for modern times
so disappointing as was excited to play but it is a buggy mess that keeps crashing with no messages from provider on upcoming fixes or patches
there is a decent story here but the game is mostly a technical mess of bugs and bad game design
game doesnt even come with support for persistent worlds lol just another asspyr cash grab they cant keep getting away with this
this is a broken version of a great game nothing has been enhanced the developer and publisher have not released any details about fixes or patches

ive played 6 hours and lost most of that play time due to constant crashes   i love the game itself and never had this many problems with the original   with this version being absolutely indistinguishable from the original in every way except much longer load time and less stable  the question is why does it exist

one of the worst of the remastered 2000s dnd games seems even more buggy than when it first came out in 2006 companion ai is junk graphics while still charming and enjoyable look totally unchanged i cant tell the difference between the original and this remaster stick with the beamdog nwn1 and the other remastered isometric games as this is trash

saving broke after hitting the mere of dead men tried swapping files and reinstall to no avail did a complete uninstall until this gets fixed was having a lot of fun replaying this and i like some of the additions here but that broke the fun when i could no longer save please fix this so i can continue my play through old bugs should be fixed here before release please release a patch
good game

is a good game reminds me of the original nwn2 though i wish beamdog would have corrected some of the bugs my main issue with the game is that it likes to randomly crash for no reason whether its trying to talk with a merchant or task npc
brought to steam and updated for modern hardware has bugs but i wasnt expecting the second coming of christ with this remaster runs good on my system
game enhanced edition

after waiting 2 decades for a remaster i was hoping for more than a bare bones one that runs a little better and looks a little nicer i would like to see some qol features bug fixes and lost content restoration  maybe after a patch or two
absolute trash just get the gog version and download skywings client extension to see multiplayer servers i mean the games hardcoding is absolute trash too
in current state unplayable original camera worked fine for me ee camera is ridiculously fast like lightspeed fast its not possible to play this game just buy original on gog

a very lazy remaster with almost no improvements graphics are almost the same bugs and crashes are not fixed companion ai is still terrible buy only if you have never played nwn2 or want to play it on steamdeck otherwise you will not find anything worthwhile here

this game truly blows  you feel ripped off immediately because the graphics and movement of those graphics is sub par  the experience however magnifies when you try to play in a group with frequent crashes adding to the fun  decide quickly to get your refund however  giving the game a chance since youve already spent the money doesnt fly with steam to get a refund if you exceed 2 hours even though they hawk this crappy game to begin with

as someone who had not played this game before this is a 1010 reccommend great writing great dnd gameplay fun quests and collectibles this is a textbook great dnd game  that said this enhanced edition is pretty lousy even without having context of having played the original bugs galore and camera issues that just should not exist in a 2025 release  the reason for my positive review is that i think the game in of itself is incredible

very buggy on release been a couple of weeks  no patches to fix even the most basic of bugs like the voice lines playing at the wrong time during character creation minor graphical upgrade compared to the original but not decades worth of technical advances worth off hand its looking like a pump  dump thumbs down

i was so excited about this enhanced edition only to be so disappointed while playing it it keeps crashing to a degree that i have never seen in the past 10 years the amount of frustration im experiencing is unbelievable

played for a few hours and i have been frustrated from the very beginning the ai of my companions is complete garbage they will run way ahead of my pc into a mob then run back to me then run to another mob triggering all the attacks of opportunities along the way thus getting themselves killed this was not the game i played many years ago i dont remember being this annoyed at my companions ai and overall shitty mechanics
as good as ever
nice little nostalgia trip still holds up
dont buy it this game is broken
great game runs fine for me love the controller support been playing it on my steam deck while traveling

i want to recommend it i do love the game but i now cannot go longer than 5 minutes without it completely freezing and needing to be killed by task manager  reading other reviews i am not alone in this either

about as good as i remember it being  mask of the betrayer is still a great story  storm of zehir might be amusing in multiplayer  and anyone who misses playing dd 35 will feel at home here  probably worth modding this game for qol and maybe tweak the difficulty

trying to understand where is the enhanced it looks and plays the same as the gog version but with a different main menu ui and the original music instead of the blaring dlc main menu theme of storm of zehir  will change the review to positive when it actually gets enhanced
fantastic game horrendous enhancement
works fine and delivers a good game
i mean come onfor me this is the classic dd game some flaws in the ai are a bit frustrating at times but i love this game
they didnt update the graphics menus are janky and it kept crashing after a few minutes in had to return it

although the ee portion of the game seems a bit lackluster the scaled ui is nice and i like that it is compatible with most mods im under the impression theyre going to address the mp part specifically using the nwserver with server vault characters and the problem with custom races if they fail to do that i would probably change my recommendation

the game is old and the camera angles was a fight i never won  but the  story  made it as hard to put down as the first time i played it  i really wish modern games could go back to their roots and learn from games like neverwinter nights 2  well done  and thank you i really missed this game
fantastic blast from the paststill a great game
this is one of the best dd games of all time no this is the best dd game of all time

i went back and forth on the review ill give it a positive because theres alot of  potential here
im having a blast

a great game even if the enhanced edition is a letdown definitely skip this if you already own another version but worth picking up if you dont  the well written party banter in the base game hard carries it and the mask of the betrayer expansion is fantastic

as of right now im fairly enjoying reliving my childhood through this game however there are too many bugs for anyone to consider this worth buying again characters constantly getting stuck on objects that arent there stuck on walls random crashes game is almost 20 years old none of these bugs should still be here on a fresh release
lots of fun

dont buy  this game  i lost 10 hours of story because broken main quest

game good cashgrab bad  i dont need an enhanced edition to have much improved graphics if even at all what i do need is modernization of ui stuff some qol stuff and especially bugfixes if most of the bugs are still intact from the original and not much else is done except release it on steam why buy this  what a waste i hope some patches will arrive some day but man its been a while already

somehow more of a buggy mess than the original release ive barely made it out of the house into west port and somehow my saves are already corrupted with the game crashing when i try to load them   its an amazing game but just go buy a different version of it and ignore this nonsense
just as fun as i remember

nwn 2 is a great game the ee is just okay doesnt do a lot but it works well out of the box graphics are marginally improved control a little better or a lot better if you want to use a controller and the camera works fine when you get the settings right   fun oc which has aged quite well and motb is brilliant

if you never played nwn2 before this is a musthave  it feels a lot smoother and the graphics much better than nwn1 or bg1bg2 and amazing to play in coop  lots of builds to try out  httpsyoutubehbzkbviqi

if you own the original release from gog theres not a lot of upgrades here and a few new bugs however if youve never played before or want to play on console this is the route to go this version does fix the ui scaling which was a major problem for higher resolutions on the original release easily goes to 2k resolution without losing anything and keeping the scaling mostly readable
never played it before the remaster control scheme works very well on steamdeck and the game looks great for the age  the class system is far more interesting to me than bg3
the typical obsidian rpg high highs low lows very buggy and unfinished its worth it for me but you decide
as someone who grew up playing dnd 35 i love the game even with the few niggling annoyances

i am really enjoying this game it was one of those games that i always wanted to finish long ago but never found the time to do that but now with a steam deck and an enhanced edition i am finding it difficult to put it down

apart from the menus i dont really see what has been enhanced if you have the original game dont think it is worth buying this but if you have not played this and you like dd based roleplaying games i highly recommend it great story both in main campaign and the mask of the betrayer expansion
